GlobalParameter.name: mcm_cac_br_trq_ebs_x_rpm
GlobalParameter.description: engine brake: rpm

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_cac_br_trq_ebs1_min_2m
GlobalParameter.description: engine brake: level 1 min torque

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_cac_br_trq_ebs2_min_2m
GlobalParameter.description: engine brake: level 2 min torque

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_cac_br_trq_ebs3_min_2m
GlobalParameter.description: engine brake: level 3 min torque

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_ebm_ebs1_temp_speed_cond_off_2m
GlobalParameter.description: Lower switch off engine oil temperature [°C] of engine brake step 1

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_ebm_ebs1_temp_speed_cond_on_2m
GlobalParameter.description: Lower switch on engine oil temperature [°C] of engine brake step 1

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_ebm_ebs1_temp_speed_cond_x_speed
GlobalParameter.description: Lower switch engine speed [rpm] of engine brake step 1

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_ebm_ebs2_temp_speed_cond_off_2m
GlobalParameter.description: Lower switch off engine oil temperature [°C] of engine brake step 2

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_ebm_ebs2_temp_speed_cond_on_2m
GlobalParameter.description: Lower switch on engine oil temperature [°C] of engine brake step 2

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_ebm_ebs2_temp_speed_cond_x_speed
GlobalParameter.description: Lower switch engine speed [rpm] of engine brake step 2

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_epf_ebm_overspeed_1m
GlobalParameter.description: Maximum permitted engine speed during engine brake mode before mechanical destruction of engine

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_epf_warn_overspeed_1m
GlobalParameter.description: Max speed for buzzer request

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_globCalc_lig_eng_speed_des_std
GlobalParameter.description: mcm_idleSpeed_rpm, mcm desired idle speed under standard operation

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_globCalc_sys_can_eng_brk_performance
GlobalParameter.description: Engine brake performance variant (0: standard engine brake, 1: high performance engine brake)

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_osg_eng_speed_max_1m
GlobalParameter.description: Engine derate speed

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_osg_eng_speed_max_ext_1m
GlobalParameter.description: Max. type 0 speed controller velocity

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_osg_trq_red_fac_2m
GlobalParameter.description: Torque reduction factor vector

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_osg_trq_red_fac_x_over_speed
GlobalParameter.description: Torque reduction speed vector

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_sys_can_engine_char_1m
GlobalParameter.description: Engine Emission Class (Euro 4, 5, 6, …)

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_sys_can_performance_class_1m
GlobalParameter.description: Nominal engine power

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_sys_can_trq_inertia_1m
GlobalParameter.description: Engine inertia (includes flywheel)

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_sys_cylinder_value_1m
GlobalParameter.description: Number of engine cylinders

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_sys_motor_type_1m
GlobalParameter.description: Engine type e.g. 471

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_tbf_trq_max_r0_2m
GlobalParameter.description: Vector of engine map full-load torque values, highestTorqueCurve for TopTorque and noTopTorque engines

GlobalParameter.description: Breakpoint vector of engine map velocity values (full-load torque values)

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_tbf_trq_max_r1_2m
GlobalParameter.description: Vector of engine map full-load torque values | lower/2nd TorqueCurve for TopTorque engines

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_tbf_trq_max_r1_x_eng_speed
GlobalParameter.description: Breakpoint vector of engine map velocity values (full-load torque values)

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_tbf_trq_max_r2_2m
GlobalParameter.description: Vector of engine map full-load torque values

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_tbf_trq_max_r2_x_eng_speed
GlobalParameter.description: Breakpoint vector of engine map velocity values (full-load torque values)

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_tfc_fm_tm_x_eng_speed
GlobalParameter.description: Breakpoint vector of engine map velocity values (specific Fuel consumption)

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_tfc_fm_tm_y_trq
GlobalParameter.description: Breakpoint vector of engine map torque values

GlobalParameter.name: mcm_tfc_fm_tmh_3m
GlobalParameter.description: Matrix of engine specific fuel consumption

GlobalParameter.description: Engine friction torque map

GlobalParameter.description: Engine friction torque map speed sampling points
